title: 374: Auditioning For Reality TV + Betting On Yourself
itunes:title: 374: Auditioning For Reality TV + Betting On Yourself
description:
#Broadsquad! Stand up comedian Michael Yo is back in the studio! They chat Real Housewives of OC, Heather Debrow, being on The Bachelor, personal auditioning stories for different reality shows, Michael’s NEW comedy special, betting on yourself, hecklers, worst stand up bombs, handling social media, Jess’ Vegas Trip, struggles with mental health, Jess doing stand up comedy, and much more! 

 

MICHAEL YO:

Watch his NEW special “I NEVER THOUGHT” here: https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=X654tRelADo&feature=youtu.be

Check out his podcast here: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/yo-show-w-michael-yo/id1475116900

Follow him on Instagram here: https://www.instagram.com/michaelyo/

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***PRETTY LITTER: Go to PRETTYLITTTER.COM/CHATTY to save 20% on your first order!

***JENNI KAYNE: Get 15% off your first order when you use code CHATTY at checkout at JENNIKAYNE.COM 

***PELOTON: Visit ONEPELOTON.COM to learn more!

***LUMINEUX: Find Lumineux on Amazon.com and get $7 off today!

***WONDERY’S CALL ME CURIOUS: Listen to Call Me Curious on Apple Podcasts, Amazon Music or wherever you listen. You can listen early and ad-free by subscribing to Wonder Plus in Apple Podcasts or the Wondrey app!
